page.title: 12KID'S GAMES IN WIS. GREEN
page.content: At school, the boys play football nearly every day.Sometimes we play "stuck-in-the-mud", what you have to do is: One person is "it" and he chases the people who are not "it". If a person is caught, he is "stuck". They stand with their legs apart until another person arrives to crawl through their legs to "free" them. At playtime in the Autumn most of the girls play "French skipping". For French skipping you need a long piece of elastic.We skip to rhymes like "England, Ireland, Scotland, Wales" and "Tinker, tailor, soldier, sailor".
